name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: One Click Login - popular social media

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Login with one click instead of typing the urls everytime, Safely, Securely

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now-a-days we see a lot of data leaks, because people login to insecure social networking URLs without knowing.
 
BUT with our extension you'll always be redirected only to the SECURED social networking sites.(CHECK FOR HTTP"S" WHENEVER YOU LOGIN TO ANY SITE)

***NOTE*** : For making our users browsing SAFE we're never going to save any users username, password or email. 

Currently we provide FACEBOOK, INSTAGRAM, TWITTER, GIT HUB , YOU TUBE

Whenever you want to login just click on the Social Networking image you wish to login and you'll be redirected in a SECURE WAY

Please give positive reviews if you liked it, for negative reviews click on 5 stars and give your -ve suggestions.I will be glad to take those and will work on them.
